contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 2, 2004 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - soprano - Newbridge. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
Sept. 28, 2011, 12:58 p.m. July 3, 2020, 10:15 p.m.
1 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland
2 Blaenavon Town Band Malcolm Jones
3 Lewis Merthyr Band Lyndon Price
4 Ynyshir Band Alan MacDonald
5 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
6 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Ron Williams
Withdrawn Cwmbran Band John Cox
